subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic finished off a 5-7, 6-1, 5-7, 6-2, 7-5 victory over Roger Federer that not only broke up the Rafa-Roger dream final but also redefined Djokovic for a global audience.
snippet: Novak Djokovic finished off a 5-7, 6-1, 5-7, 6-2, 7-5 victory over Roger Federer that not only broke up the Rafa-Roger dream final but also redefined Djokovic for a global audience.
